lom:description.lom:string: Exploring science locally - sharing insights globally Join the thousands of schools around the World where students are exchanging information, opinions and ideas on a variety of science topics with young people in every continent. Exchanges are possible in several languages. Explore this website to see the wide range of topics and free resources in several languages (English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian and Dutch.
